bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Raquel Romero, December 6, 1944

div1.p: Hench requests that Romero send him a reference to the article about Maass.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Raquel Romero, December 6, 1944
div1.opener:
PSH/cb
6 December, 1944
Senora Raquel Romero
Calle 23, 309 Altos
Vedado, Habana
Cuba
My dear Senora Romero:
div1.p:
In my letter to you the other day, I forgot to request again
that you send me the reference to the article on Miss Maas. You kindly
told me that you would send me this reference.

closer.signed:
PHILIP S. HENCH, Lt. Col., M.C.
Chief of the Medical Service
